```{r}
cars <- data.frame(mtcars, package="datasets")
cars <- as.data.frame(cars)
```



```{r}

# Create a base graph -- Claire 
library(ggplot2)
str(cars)
cars$cyl <- as.factor(cars$cyl)
ggplot(cars, aes(x=hp, y=mpg, color=cyl, shape=cyl)) +
    geom_point(size=3)
```


```{r}

# adding labels - Kylie 
library(ggplot2)
str(cars)
cars$cyl <- as.factor(cars$cyl)
ggplot(cars, aes(x=hp, y=mpg, color=cyl, shape=cyl)) +
    geom_point(size=3) + xlab('Horsepower') + ylab('Miles Per Gallon')
```
    
  
```{r}

# adding title - Emma 
library(ggplot2)
str(cars)
cars$cyl <- as.factor(cars$cyl)
ggplot(cars, aes(x=hp, y=mpg, color=cyl, shape=cyl)) +
    geom_point(size=3) + xlab('Horsepower') + ylab('Miles Per Gallon') + 
  ggtitle("Horsepower versus Miles Per Gallon")
```
